achievements.name: Unexpected
achievements.description: Convert 100 units using Spanish Missionaries.

achievements.name: Losing Your Religion
achievements.description: Convert an enemy Monk.

achievements.name: Chain Reaction
achievements.description: Blow up an enemy Demolition Ship with a Demolition Ship of your own.

achievements.name: Kaboom
achievements.description: Kill 1,000 enemy units using Demolition Ships.

achievements.name: Bull's Eye
achievements.description: Destroy a Trebuchet with another Trebuchet.

achievements.name: The Wonder, the Wonder, the...Oh, Never Mind
achievements.description: Prevent the Korean Wonder from being destroyed in the "Noryang Point (1598)" mission of the Historical Battles.

achievements.name: A Truly Holy Emperor
achievements.description: Convert the Cathedral in Milan without acquiring a single Villager in the third Barbarossa mission "Pope and Antipope".

achievements.name: No Wonder on my Watch
achievements.description: Destroy every enemy Wonder before it is completed in the sixth Attila the Hun mission "The Fall of Rome".

achievements.name: Diplomacy is for the Meek
achievements.description: Kill the Scythian Prince and defeat the Scythians in the first Attila the Hun mission "The Scourge of God".

achievements.name: The Kushluk Assassination
achievements.description: Kill Kushluk before 20 minutes have elapsed in the second Genghis Khan mission "A Life of Revenge".

achievements.name: I Was in China Before
achievements.description: Defeat the Jin before they start constructing a Wonder in the third Genghis Khan mission "Into China".

achievements.name: Offense Is the Best Defense
achievements.description: Defeat all opponents before constructing a Wonder in the sixth Saladin mission "The Lion and the Demon".

achievements.name: The Go-Getter
achievements.description: Defeat the Hungarians before Subotai has arrived in the sixth Genghis Khan mission "Pax Mongolica".

achievements.name: Furor Teutonicus
achievements.description: Defeat all opponents instead of collecting the required Relics in the first Barbarossa mission "Holy Roman Emperor".

achievements.name: Truly Countless Bodies
achievements.description: Defeat all opponents before 30 minutes have elapsed in the fifth Attila the Hun mission "The Catalaunian Fields".

achievements.name: Hot & Spicy
achievements.description: Prevent Tabasco from being defeated in the third Montezuma mission "Quetzalcoatl".

achievements.name: Battleship
achievements.description: Win the Historical Battle "Lepanto (1571)" without allowing any Turkish Transport Ship to unload on your shores.

achievements.name: Relic Hoarder
achievements.description: Collect all Relics on the map in the fifth Suryavarman mission "Nirvanapada".

achievements.name: The Missionary
achievements.description: Collect all Relics in the first El Cid mission "Brother Against Brother".

achievements.name: Turkish Delight
achievements.description: Win "Bapheus (1302)" by defeating Turkish factions without allying with them in single player.

achievements.name: Lone Warrior
achievements.description: Win "Kurikara (1183)" without forming an alliance with the Hojo clan in single player.

achievements.name: Fire with Fire
achievements.description: Amass 10 Condottieri, 10 Genoese Crossbowmen, and 10 Bombard Cannons in the fifth Dracula mission "The Night Falls".

achievements.name: Raging Wildfire
achievements.description: Conquer Delhi at least 5 minutes before the timer expires in the fourth Tamerlane mission "Sultan of Hindustan".

achievements.name: Chasing the Crown
achievements.description: Kill King Takayutpi before 5 minutes have elapsed in the first Bayinnaung mission "The Burmese Tigers".

achievements.name: Friends, Countrymen, Lend Me Your Ears
achievements.description: Convert Afonso de Albuquerque without killing a single Portuguese unit in the fifth Francisco de Almeida mission "A Son's Blood".

achievements.name: Numerous As the Grains of Sand
achievements.description: Win the second Alaric mission "Razing Hellas" while training no military units aside from infantry.

achievements.name: Rome Was Destroyed in One Day
achievements.description: Destroy all Roman Castles before 30 minutes have elapsed in the fourth Alaric mission "The Giant Falls".

achievements.name: Smoke on the Water
achievements.description: Purchase 20 Dragon Ships in the Historical Battle "Lake Poyang (1363)".

achievements.name: With the Help of My Sisters
achievements.description: Amass an army of at least 100 Gbeto Warriors in the fourth Sundjata mission "Blood on the River Bank".

achievements.name: Roar like a Lion
achievements.description: Win the fifth Sundjata mission "The Lion's Den" on Hard difficulty.

achievements.name: An Army Marches on Its Stomach
achievements.description: Complete all secondary objectives and destroy all of Dagnajan's smaller bases before Dagnajan and his army march in the third Yodit mission "A Fallen Crown".

achievements.name: No Royal Hair Touched
achievements.description: Reach the King before 10 minutes have elapsed in the second Gajah Mada mission "Unconditional Loyalty".

achievements.name: Not a Greek Tragedy
achievements.description: Win without losing any of your four heroes in the fifth Le Loi mission "A Three-Pronged Attack".

achievements.name: Cuman Flush
achievements.description: Win the second Kotyan mission "The Battle at the Kalka River" without advancing to the Castle Age.

achievements.name: He Won't Be Back
achievements.description: Assist King Bela and defeat the Austrian Duke Frederick in the fifth Kotyan mission "A New Home" before 45 minutes have elapsed.

achievements.name: Pitched Battle
achievements.description: Successfully defend Cuzco without constructing any new walls or gates in the second Pachacuti mission "The Field of Blood".

achievements.name: D-Day (D stands for Demo)
achievements.description: Destroy an enemy Transport Ship with a Demolition Ship.

achievements.name: Eternal Gratitude
achievements.description: Encounter a Penguin in the Historical Battle "Vinlandsaga".

achievements.description: Kill 25 units with Trebuchets.

achievements.description: Burn down 200 buildings with Tarkans.

achievements.name: Castle Crusher

achievements.description: Build 300 Trebuchets.

achievements.description: Build 1,000 Farms in total.

achievements.name: Landslide Election
achievements.description: Capture all Tabriz noblemen in "Road to Royalty".

achievements.name: I Ain't 'Fraid of No Guns
achievements.description: Defeat the Ottomans in "Khata'i".

achievements.name: Lord of the Mountains
achievements.description: Complete the Thoros the Great campaign.

achievements.name: Bounty Hunter
achievements.description: Convert at least three Byzantine generals in "The Emperor's Revenge".

achievements.name: Raiding Party!
achievements.description: Defeat all enemy Cypriot players in "Bloody Crestwaves".

achievements.name: Church Sanctuary
achievements.description: Do not lose any Tarsos Villagers in "Of Turncoats and Traitors".

achievements.name: Georgia On My Mind
achievements.description: Complete the Tamar campaign.

achievements.name: Game's Over Yury
achievements.description: Defeat Yury before the end of the siege in "Yury's Revenge".

achievements.name: Auntie Dearest
achievements.description: Ensure Alexios completes his Wonder in "Tamar the Builder".

achievements.name: Alexandra the Great
achievements.description: Complete all side-quests in "The Queen in the Panther's Skin".

achievements.name: Armenian Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Armenians.

achievements.name: Georgian Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Georgians.

achievements.name: Heroes and Villains
achievements.description: Complete all Victors and Vanquished scenarios on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Lost Vikings
achievements.description: Find three lost Vikings in "Finehair (870)".

achievements.name: The Old-fashioned Way
achievements.description: Win without constructing a Trebuchet in "Stephen (1135)".

achievements.name: Daimyo of the Nine Provinces
achievements.description: Defeat the Shogun and conquer all Nine Provinces by 1600 CE in "Shimazu (1545)".

achievements.name: Plebeian Preserver
achievements.description: Do not lose a Villager in "Constantine XI (1453)."

achievements.name: Vandalized
achievements.description: Sack Rome by 455 CE in "Gaiseric (406)".

achievements.name: United We Fall
achievements.description: Obtain four allies before the Mongols arrive in "Mstislav (1203)".

achievements.name: Age of Vikings
achievements.description: Find all Viking heroes in "Ironside (859)".

achievements.name: Generational Ambitions
achievements.description: Achieve all of a leader's ambitions in "Seljuk (985)".

achievements.name: Bread and Circuses
achievements.description: Support the winning chariot team in "Komnenos (1081)".

achievements.name: Galleon Bling
achievements.description: Capture a Spanish Galleon in "Drake (1572)".

achievements.name: So Epic
achievements.description: Complete all 50 Saga objectives in "Ragnar (850)".

achievements.name: Civis Romanus
achievements.description: Do not lose a city in "Vortigern (440)".

achievements.name: Seeds of Their Own Destruction
achievements.description: Win "Vortigern (440)" after recruiting Saxon Foederati twelve times.

achievements.name: A Most Convenient Death
achievements.description: Ensure Carloman dies in "Charlemagne (768)."

achievements.name: Faster Than a Speeding Cannonball
achievements.description: Kill Constantine XI and capture the Hagia Sophia before 15 May 1453 in "Fetih (1453)".

achievements.name: Trust No One
achievements.description: Win "Robert (921)" by attacking and defeating all dukes and the King of the Franks.

achievements.name: Coup D'tat
achievements.description: Win "Robert (921)" by gaining the support of at least three dukes.

achievements.name: Saxon Revenge
achievements.description: Defeat West Francia in "Otto (936)".

achievements.name: Shogun
achievements.description: Win "Nobunaga (1551)" on Hard difficulty with any faction.

achievements.name: Nemesis
achievements.description: Finish the entire Chronicles: Battle for Greece campaign.

achievements.name: Enter the Epic
achievements.description: Complete "Prologue: Gates of the Gods".

achievements.name: Leader of Men
achievements.description: Attain all available aura upgrades in the Battle for Greece campaign.

achievements.name: Fight in the Shade
achievements.description: Survive at Thermopylae for 5 minutes after completing the main objective in "The Hot Gates".

achievements.name: First Citizen
achievements.description: Complete "Within the Long Walls" without your favor ever dropping below 50.

achievements.name: All Accounted For
achievements.description: Do not lose a single resource cart in "Greeks Bearing Gifts".

achievements.name: A Suitable Satrap
achievements.description: Complete "The Ionian Revolt" without Aristagoras ever holding more than four towns simultaneously.

achievements.name: Friend of Artemisia
achievements.description: Assist Artemisia in both "Chasing Smoke" and "Earth and Water".

achievements.name: The Great King's Wrath
achievements.description: Defeat all enemy players in "Earth and Water"

achievements.name: Marathonomachos
achievements.description: Find and complete all quests in "The Battle of Marathon".

achievements.name: Admirable Admiral
achievements.description: Research all naval technologies in "Raise the Sails".

achievements.name: Thundering Zeus!
achievements.description: Do not lose a single Market or Port in Byzantium during "Wrath of the Regent".

achievements.name: Friend of the Helots
achievements.description: Complete "Pyres on the Coast" without looting any Messenian tombs.

achievements.name: Tomb Raider
achievements.description: Complete "Pyres on the Coast" after looting every Messenian tomb.

achievements.name: Sack and Burn
achievements.description: Loot Notium, Priene, and the three cities specified by Cyrus in "Blood and Gold".

achievements.name: Crisis Management
achievements.description: Complete "The Fruits of Empire" without demanding medium or high tribute.

achievements.name: Blockade Breaker
achievements.description: Destroy both naval blockades in "Divine Salamis".

achievements.name: Philolacon
achievements.description: Give a relic to the Spartans in both "Across the Wine-Dark Sea" and "Wrath of the Regent".

achievements.name: Reject the Regent
achievements.description: Give a relic to Salamis in "Across the Wine-Dark Sea" and to Polycritus in "Wrath of the Regent".

achievements.name: Combined Arms
achievements.description: Complete "The Fall of Athens" without researching any special infantry technologies.

achievements.name: By Ahuramazda's Grace
achievements.description: Research an Achaemenid Town Center upgrade.

achievements.name: Political Animal
achievements.description: Change your policy as the Athenians.

achievements.name: Promachos
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemy units with a Spartan Polemarch.

achievements.name: Achaemenid Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Achaemenid in Chronicles: Battle for Greece.

achievements.name: Athenian Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Athenians in Chronicles: Battle for Greece.

achievements.name: Spartan Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Spartans in Chronicles: Battle for Greece.

achievements.name: But It's Provocative
achievements.description: Provoke Fu Jian before he is ready in "Xie An (383)"

achievements.name: Wei Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Wei.

achievements.name: Shu Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Shu.

achievements.name: Wu Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Wu.

achievements.name: The Imperial Uncle
achievements.description: Complete the Liu Bei campaign.

achievements.name: A Hero Comes; He Gains Renown
achievements.description: Use one of your heroes' active abilities in Liu Bei 1.

achievements.name: Awaken the Dragon
achievements.description: Deploy Zhuge Liang's fire trap in Liu Bei 3.

achievements.name: Man of the People
achievements.description: Bring all Civilian Carriages to Sun Quan in Liu Bei 4.

achievements.name: Hero of Chaos
achievements.description: Complete the Cao Cao campaign.

achievements.name: Horses for Courses
achievements.description: Train no military units aside from mounted units in Cao Cao 1.

achievements.name: Like Taking Candy From A Baby
achievements.description: Take Ye before defeating any of the brothers in Cao Cao 4.

achievements.name: Do Not Pursue L Bu
achievements.description: Defeat L Bu before 20 minutes have elapsed in Cao Cao 2.

achievements.name: King of the Southlands
achievements.description: Complete the Sun Clan campaign.

achievements.name: The Tiger of Jiangdong
achievements.description: Defeat Dong Zhuo's Raiders in Sun Clan 1.

achievements.name: The Little Conqueror
achievements.description: Defeat the White Tiger in Sun Clan 3.

achievements.name: I Am Coming For You, Liu Biao
achievements.description: Capture all Castles in Sun Clan 4.

achievements.name: Drive-By Barrage
achievements.description: Build 20 War Chariots as the Shu.

achievements.name: Shu'ing Enemies
achievements.description: Kill 50 units with White Feather Guards as the Shu.

achievements.name: Time for a Raise
achievements.description: Fully promote 10 Tiger Cavalry as the Wei.

achievements.name: Wei March on Our Stomachs
achievements.description: Generate 5000 food with Tuntian as the Wei.

achievements.name: Acid Rain
achievements.description: Destroy 20 buildings with Fire Archers as the Wu.

achievements.name: Dare to Die
achievements.description: Re-equip 20 shields with Jian Swordsmen as the Wu.

achievements.name: Jurchens Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Jurchens.

achievements.name: Khitans Victory
achievements.description: Win a game playing as the Khitans.

achievements.name: Fireworks Show
achievements.description: Fire 100 projectiles with Rocket Carts.

achievements.name: I'm On Fire... Fireball!
achievements.description: Kill 50 units with Fire Lancers' charged attacks.

achievements.name: I Am the Storm
achievements.description: Do 10000 damage with Grenadiers and Rocket Carts with Thunderclap Bombs researched as the Jurchens.

achievements.name: Steppe People
achievements.description: Build 50 Pastures as the Khitans.

achievements.name: Iron Army
achievements.description: Block 100 attacks with Iron Pagodas as the Jurchens.

achievements.name: Medieval Slasher
achievements.description: Kill 50 units with Liao Daos as the Khitans.
